summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DEHB university exam preparation app. All backend APIs working perfectly (19/19 tests passed). Frontend integration successful with achievements system functioning correctly. Minor UI modal overlay issue identified but core functionality intact.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting pointer events in some dialogs
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True for clicks or alternative selectors

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes for accessibility

passed_tests: Task CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Study statistics CRUD and summary calculations
Data integration between backend and frontend
